sections.label: Urban/Wastewater virome
sections.query: (virome OR "viral metagenomics") AND (wastewater OR sewage OR "built environment" OR urban)

sections.label: Metagenomics methods
sections.query: metagenomics AND (benchmark* OR pipeline OR "quality control" OR assembly OR classification)

items.title: From niche to niche: investigating microbial communities and their specialised metabolite gene clusters in human microbiomes.
items.authors: Alyaa Abdelhameed, Raghad Hassan Hussein, Zainab Amer Hatem, Caner Bağcı, Nadine Ziemert
items.abstract_snippet: Diverse microbial communities within the human microbiome perform vital functions which influence both health and disease in hosts. Specialized metabolites produced by microbes via biosynthetic gene clusters (BGCs) drive ecological interactions and offer possi…

items.title: First report of Castellaniella spp. infection in dogs and the genomic evidence of a novel species.
items.authors: Lina Crespo Bilhalva, Mark N Yacoub, Andrea P Dos Santos, Sabrina R Manley, Paola Mayorga Guasch, Janina A Krumbeck
items.abstract_snippet: This study reports the first documented cases of Castellaniella spp. infection in dogs, describing associated clinical and pathological findings and characterizing a novel species within this genus.

sections.label: Influenza evolution
sections.query: (influenza OR flu) AND (evolution OR "positive selection" OR "antigenic drift" OR clade)

items.title: From Plato to Pareto: Defining the shape of infection's disease space.

items.title: Global risk mapping of highly pathogenic avian influenza H5N1 and H5Nx in the light of epidemic episodes occurring from 2020 onwards.

items.title: Repeat influenza vaccination effects in 2021/22 and 2022/23 in a community-based cohort in Hong Kong.
items.authors: Jennifer C Zhong, Shuyi Zhong, Lisa Touyon, Faith Ho, Niki Y M Au, Samuel M S Cheng
items.abstract_snippet: Repeated annual influenza vaccination has been associated with attenuated immune responses and reduced clinical effectiveness. Most studies of repeat vaccination immunogenicity have focused on the responses at 30 days after vaccination. As influenza did not ci…

items.title: Genetic diversity and evolution of H1N1 subtype swine influenza virus in China: a comprehensive analysis from 1977 to 2020.
items.authors: Yuzhong Zhao, Lebin Han, Haotian Sang, Pingping Yang, Yihong Xiao, Yanmeng Hou
